snippet: Edward S. Lampert's hedge fund, ESL Investments, has moved to Miami from Greenwich, Conn., but its president will not be going with the firm, Bloomberg News reports. William C. Crowley, who had been president and chief operating officer of ESL, which...
abstract: Edward S. Lampert's hedge fund, ESL Investments, has moved to Miami from Greenwich, Conn., but its president will not be going with the firm, Bloomberg News reports. William C. Crowley, who had been president and chief operating officer of ESL, which controls Sears Holdings, has decided not to relocate, ESL said in a regulatory filing. .

headline.main: Executive Steps Down From Lampert's Hedge Fund
